description: A renowned architect from Sumeru, Kaveh is a Dendro claymore user who excels at triggering Bloom reactions and supporting his team.

artifacts.name: Flower of Paradise Lost (2) + Gilded Dreams (2)

info: Kaveh is a Dendro support and Bloom enabler. Build him for Elemental Mastery to maximize Bloom damage.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Schematic Setup
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Artistic Ingenuity
skills.desc: Kaveh scans the battlefield and deals AoE Dendro DMG, triggering all Dendro Cores in range to explode immediately.
skills.details_html:
Artistic Ingenuity
Deals AoE Dendro DMG and triggers all Dendro Cores in range to explode immediately.

skills.name: Painted Dome
skills.desc: Kaveh creates a Painted Dome, dealing AoE Dendro DMG and granting all party members increased Bloom reaction DMG.
skills.details_html:
Painted Dome
Creates a Painted Dome, dealing AoE Dendro DMG and granting all party members increased Bloom reaction DMG for 12s.

passive_talents.name: The Art of Budgeting
passive_talents.desc: When Kaveh takes DMG from a Dendro Core explosion, he recovers HP equal to 300% of his Elemental Mastery.

passive_talents.name: A Craftsman's Curious Conceptions
passive_talents.desc: During Painted Dome, Kaveh's Elemental Mastery is increased by 100.

passive_talents.name: An Architect's Undertaking
passive_talents.desc: When Kaveh crafts a weapon ascension material, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Sublime Salutations
constellations.desc: Within 3s after using Artistic Ingenuity, Kaveh's Dendro RES is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Grace of Royal Roads
constellations.desc: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15% during Painted Dome.

constellations.name: Profferings of Dur Untash
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Artistic Ingenuity by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Feast of Apadana
constellations.desc: When Kaveh's HP is less than 50%, he gains 30% incoming healing bonus.

constellations.name: Treasures of Bonkhanak
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Painted Dome by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Idylls of Kashan
constellations.desc: After using Artistic Ingenuity or Painted Dome, Kaveh's Elemental Mastery is increased by 150 for 8s.
